attributes.action: family  law. why  are we  forcing children to see abscent  parents
attributes.additional_details: the  require  that every child needs to  know  both parents?  the  law  forces  children to  see abscent parents  even if child does not want  to  and  it is a negative  affect  on the  child ?but  the  law cannot force  an abscent parent to see a child .   so that  message the  law   is  quoting   is  very one  sided   and  laws need to  change   . yes   a child  has i right to know  both  parent   but only if its  going to  be a positive  experience and benificial to the children
